articles.title: Ukraine war must end, South African President Ramaphosa tells Putin - BBC
articles.description: Cyril Ramaphosa and other African leaders met the Ukrainian and Russian presidents in their peace bid.
articles.content:
The war in Ukraine must end, South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa has told Russia's leader Vladimir Putin. 
Mr Ramaphosa's remarks came as he met Mr Putin in St Petersburg on Saturday as part of… [+2002 chars]
